API reference

API reference#

This section describes the various workchains, calculations, parsers, and data types provided by the AiiDA-TrainsPot module for training and evaluating interatomic potentials.

  • Workchains
    • TrainsPotWorkChain
      • TrainsPotWorkChain.ab_initio_labelling()
      • TrainsPotWorkChain.dataset_augmentation()
      • TrainsPotWorkChain.define()
      • TrainsPotWorkChain.exploration()
      • TrainsPotWorkChain.exploration_frame_extraction()
      • TrainsPotWorkChain.finalize_dataset_augmentation()
      • TrainsPotWorkChain.initialization()
      • TrainsPotWorkChain.training()
    • DatasetAugmentationWorkChain
      • DatasetAugmentationWorkChain.check_inputs()
      • DatasetAugmentationWorkChain.define()
      • DatasetAugmentationWorkChain.get_builder_with_structures()
      • DatasetAugmentationWorkChain.run_dataset_generation()
    • AbInitioLabellingWorkChain
      • AbInitioLabellingWorkChain.define()
      • AbInitioLabellingWorkChain.run_ab_initio_labelling()
      • AbInitioLabellingWorkChain.setup()
    • TrainingWorkChain
      • TrainingWorkChain.define()
      • TrainingWorkChain.run_training()
    • ExplorationWorkChain
      • ExplorationWorkChain.define()
    • MaceTrainWorkChain
      • MaceTrainWorkChain.define()
      • MaceTrainWorkChain.handle_out_of_walltime()
      • MaceTrainWorkChain.report_error_handled()
      • MaceTrainWorkChain.set_restart()
      • MaceTrainWorkChain.setup()
  • Calculations
    • MaceTrainCalculation
      • MaceTrainCalculation.define()
      • MaceTrainCalculation.prepare_for_submission()
    • EvaluationCalculation
      • EvaluationCalculation.define()
      • EvaluationCalculation.prepare_for_submission()
  • Parsers
    • MaceBaseParser
      • MaceBaseParser.parse()
    • EvaluationParser
      • EvaluationParser.parse()
  • Data Types
    • PESData
      • PESData.get_ase_list()
      • PESData.get_labelled()
      • PESData.get_list()
      • PESData.get_txt()
      • PESData.get_unlabelled()
      • PESData.len_labelled
      • PESData.len_unlabelled
      • PESData.set_list()
  • Scripts
    • main()
